channel.title: Posts on Taomaker
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Taomaker

item.title: Managing family finance with ledger-cli
item.description: ledger-cli is one of the text-based productivity tools I used frequently. I used to use Mint.com to collect my income and expenses. It helped me a lot showing the snap shot of our family finance conditions. The main problem we found, is that we have to frequently update the login creditials for connected accounts. Some accounts are never supported. There is no way to track business related expenses. Another minority issue, is that the report format is fixed, but we need a customized report for our monthly finance review.

item.title: 生活中那些快乐的小事
item.description: 浏览购物网站十多页，无一想买，思考商家背后套路。不亦乐乎！ 小崽子回国，留脏衣一篓。每日拿起来嗅，如在。不亦乐乎！ 购披萨面团，烙葱油大饼，如故

item.title: 工作与生活的原则
item.description: 鸡汤作用有限。好学，深思，力行才可找到人生的动力。 – 傅佩荣 个人幸福不是一切，人还有责任。 – Victor Frankl，孔子 不追求激情，贵在坚持。 – Derek Sivers, Cal

item.title: 终生学习感悟
item.description: 学习如何学习 我们的基础教育和大学教育都没有关于“如何学习”的课程。我们的学习方法基本是为了应付应试教育和职业需求被动形成的。大学毕业后，我曾

item.title: 极简工具集-从实物到软件
item.description: 如果你曾经觉得自己无法专注，这不是你的错。不论是手机软件、娱乐节目、新闻媒体，还是各种商品和工具，它们背后的企业都在想方设法获取我们的注意力

item.title: My 2017 reading list
item.description: The Shortest History of Europe Peter Thiel: Zero to One Give and Take: Why Helping Others Drives Our Success Li Ruihuan 李瑞环, Philosophy: An Art of Living 学哲学，用哲学 读书笔记 Vincent Ruggier, Beyond feelings, A guide to critical thinking Han Feizi 韩非子 Ram Charan etc, The Leadership Pipeline: How to Build the Leadership Powered Company Kerry Ratterson,

item.title: Rodenstock Reomar 38mm adapted to Sony ILCE
item.description: This lens came with Kodak Instamatic 250, a 126 format camera. It is a very tiny lens. The Reomar means a three-element design. There are only aperture blades.

item.title: Zeiss Ikon Color_Pantar 45mm f/2.8 from Contessamat SE
item.description: This lens is from Zeiss Ikon Contessamat SE. Download STL file here: thingiverse.
